CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked Child difficult to understand; lots_of self- repetition because M was unresponsive , she would say huh? after C made repeated attempts , then C would repeat himself yet again

u.a: said to self as C walks away
tries to get M's chair to move
M and C struggle with cookie .
C is on chair at shelf getting box
M offers page of questionnaire for C to write on; C writes while M watches
tries to take pencil from C
meaning he wants M to be done
walks away from M; carrying clipboard
C is struggling to open door
whines about not pouring the juice himself
